Sentencas: Orientation relationships (ORs), interface planes and growth directions of the directionally solidified eutectics NiO-YSZ, CoO-YSZ, NiO-CeO2, NiO-GDC, CoO-CeO2 and CoO-GDC have been determined by means of electron backscatter diffraction (EBSD).
Titulo: Orientation relationships and interfaces in directionally solidified eutectics for solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: The eutectics were prepared by the laser floating zone technique at different growth rates (10-200 mm/h) to explore dissimilar lamellar spacing.
Titulo: Orientation relationships and interfaces in directionally solidified eutectics for solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: The majority OR is characterized by a single (1 1 1)(NiO/CoO)//(0 0 1)(YSZ/GDC/CeO2) interface plane and two different growth directions:
Titulo: Orientation relationships and interfaces in directionally solidified eutectics for solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: [0 (1) over bar 1](NiO/CoO)//[0 1 0](YSZ/GDC/CeO2) and [1 (1) over bar 0](NiO/CoO similar to)//[1 1 0](YSZ/GDC/CeO2), the OR being the same for both cases.
Titulo: Orientation relationships and interfaces in directionally solidified eutectics for solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: In addition, a cube-on-cube OR, where the crystallographic axes of the component phases are parallel, has also been observed.
Titulo: Orientation relationships and interfaces in directionally solidified eutectics for solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: These experimental results are discussed in terms of the ionic charge balance and the lattice misfit at the interface.
Titulo: Orientation relationships and interfaces in directionally solidified eutectics for solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: The coincidence of reciprocal lattice points model (CRLP) has also been applied to the NiO-YSZ case.
Titulo: Orientation relationships and interfaces in directionally solidified eutectics for solid oxide fuel cell anodes

Sentencas: The most favourable ORs predicted by the CRLP model are consistent with the experimental findings.
Titulo: Orientation relationships and interfaces in directionally solidified eutectics for solid oxide fuel cell anodes
